data.meta_description:
I'm still frustrated that I missed BLUE GIANT anime movie.

I am desperate to watch this -- and I WISH it had a longer theatrical run or that more indie…
data.text:
The Best Action Movies of 2023 List 2023 has seen some fantastic action movies, and these are the best the year has offered so far. 2023 has been a phenomenal year for cinema. Horror and animation have produced some truly sensational films over the years, and these are two of the genres that have made the biggest splash this year. However, perhaps the genre that has produced the best films is action. So far, audiences have been treated to new entries from Indiana Jones, Mission: Impossible, and John Wick while discovering some original action films that could jumpstart their own franchises. 2023 is far from over. There's still a lot to look forward to, from The Marvels to Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom to John Woo's Silent Night. With that in mind, here are the best action movies of 2023 so far. 15: Plane 14: Gran Turismo 13: Guy Richie's The Covenant 12: Fast X 11: The Killer 10: Extraction 2 9: The Equalizer 3 8: Creed III 7: Polite Society 6: Sisu 5: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 4: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny 3: Dungeons and Dragons: Honor Among Thieves 2: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One 1: John Wick: Chapter 4 #Worldfree4u #Hollywood #MoviesList #Best #Action #Movies Top movie lists from the experts at WorldFree4uX.

WorldFree4u Super Hit 10 Movies List Where the Main Character Must Make an Impossible Choice. More often than not, movies raise the stakes to the maximum by placing the main character with an ultimatum when there is no good solution. In any cinematic story, we are most connected to the main character. Whether it is their plight or their humble victories, we feel great compassion for them and support them in making the right decision. Knowing that your choices impact key themes, character arcs, the overall narrative, and outcomes, we synchronize our hopes and fears with your journey. And yet, some movies raise the stakes to the maximum by placing the hero with an ultimatum when there is no good solution. They are forced to prioritize one impossible thing over the other, and their decision eventually sparks interesting debates, even years after the film hits the screen. The films featured on this list show how character-driven cinema reaches new heights through such heartbreaking dilemmas. Giving full credit to the directors and actors, these films allow us to walk in the shoes of others and help us understand what it is like to be stripped of easy answers. 1: Past Lives 2: Superman: The Movie 3: Spider-Man 4: Avengers: Infinity War/Avengers: Endgame 5: The Empire Strikes Back 6: Sophie’s Choice 7: The Dark Knight 8: Speed 9: I Am Legend 10: Shaun of the Dead #Worldfree4u #Hollywood #MoviesList #10Movies #List #Main #Character #MustMake #Impossible #Choice Top movie lists from the experts at WorldFree4uX.
